Uses of Package
com.salesforce.androidsdk.auth

  • Packages that use com.salesforce.androidsdk.auth 
    Package Description
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.auth  
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.rest  
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.ui  
  • Classes in com.salesforce.androidsdk.auth used by com.salesforce.androidsdk.auth 
    Class and Description
    HttpAccess
    Generic HTTP Access layer - used internally by RestClient and OAuth2.
    OAuth2.IdServiceResponse
    Helper class to parse an identity service response.
    OAuth2.OAuthFailedException
    Exception thrown when refresh fails.
    OAuth2.TokenEndpointResponse
    Helper class to parse a token refresh response.
    OAuth2.TokenErrorResponse
    Helper class to parse a token refresh error response.
    SalesforceTLSSocketFactory
    Custom SSLSocketFactory implementation to disable the default usage of TLS 1.0, and use only TLS 1.1 or 1.2, as per Salesforce server's new requirements.
  • Classes in com.salesforce.androidsdk.auth used by com.salesforce.androidsdk.rest 
    Class and Description
    HttpAccess
    Generic HTTP Access layer - used internally by RestClient and OAuth2.
  • Classes in com.salesforce.androidsdk.auth used by com.salesforce.androidsdk.ui 
    Class and Description
    OAuth2.IdServiceResponse
    Helper class to parse an identity service response.
    OAuth2.TokenEndpointResponse
    Helper class to parse a token refresh response.
